Destructive Self Potrait 001
This photo is my self portrait. I try to explore gestures to represent the loneliness, isolation, limitations, and suffering that I have experienced so far.  through philosophical reflection, I conclude that life is useless, because everything that happens in the world is just a repetition of what has happened in the past.  In this photo I also represent the current authority of the human body.  Whose body is this when humans are contaminated with industrialism like now?  are they still theirs or just a commodity that has to adapt over time?

this Photo is one of three photos for this personal project.
